articles.author: Morgan McFall-Johnsen
articles.title: US adults carrying loaded handguns daily doubled in just 4 years - Business Insider
articles.description: Handgun-toting Americans mostly said they carried their weapons for protection from other people. Gun purchases and deaths have also surged.
articles.content:
US adults carrying a loaded handgun on a daily basis nearly doubled between 2015 and 2019.
Nearly 6 million Americans were toting loaded handguns on a daily basis in 2019, up from about 3 million ju… [+3578 chars]
